name: Touhou Gensokyo Rescue
description:
This a little touhou fan game made chaotically by three persons three days before the deadline, but it was funny.

That being said,
the story is basically a girl (new OC made up on the day) descendant of the yokais and the Rinnosuke family that wants to destroy the Gensokyo (aka the illusion world) and you have to kill the bad girl so you can save people and the realm.

You can play using ur keyboard.

This is messed up (and pretty HARD) but really fun
